data.title: Talia Bennett on LinkedIn: A powerhouse in the financial industry. I will miss your advice and…
data.meta_description: A powerhouse in the financial industry. I will miss your advice and support, but beyond blessed I’ve been able to experience your wisdom these past 25 years…
data.text: I am proud to share that I have recently graduated from Columbia University - Columbia University School of Professional Studies with a Master's in Sustainability Management! This accomplishment marks an important milestone in my pursuit of creating positive change and contributing to a more sustainable future. Throughout my time at Columbia, I have been fortunate to engage with exceptional faculty members, collaborate with passionate peers, and delve deep into the intricate world of sustainability. My journey at Columbia has further solidified my commitment to champion sustainability in every facet of my career. I am grateful to the incredible faculty, mentors, and fellow students who have supported and inspired me throughout this transformative experience. Your guidance, knowledge, and shared enthusiasm have played an instrumental role in shaping my understanding and fueling my ambition to drive sustainable change. Thank you to my family, friends, and professional network. While working full-time and attending school part-time these last 3 years, I could not have done this without your unwavering support and encouragement during this incredible journey. I am thrilled to embark on the next chapter of my career and contribute to a more sustainable and resilient future. #ColumbiaUniversity #SustainabilityManagement #Graduation #SustainabilityChampion
